mean_en: connected with genes (\u003d the units in the cells of a living thing that control its physical characteristics) or genetics (\u003d the study of genes )
sentence: I am always fascinated by the genetic mystery.
sentence_trans: 我总是对基因的奥秘着迷。
word_etyma: gen出生，产生 + etic与……相关的 → 与出生相关的 → genetic基因的，遗传学的
